dct:title: Miami-Dade Property Boundary
dct:creator: Miami Dade County

dct:description:
A polygon feature class of all properties within Miami-Dade County.

A polygon feature class of all properties within Miami-Dade County that includes property appraiser data.

Updated: Weekly-Sat

The data was created using: 
Projected Coordinate System: WGS_1984_Web_Mercator_Auxiliary_Sphere
Projection: Mercator_Auxiliary_Sphere
prov:action:
#########
# GDSC ETL is performed in two steps: shell script to ETL data into postgres
# and then additional transformations with SQL in postGIS (if needed).
####

#########
# Step 1 - bash script (pseudo code)
####

# create directory structure and move into it
mkdir -p /data/mdc_property_boundary/{download,etl} && cd /data/mdc_property_boundary

# set update flag based on last update and update frequency
do_update=0 if date() < last_update + update_frequency else do_update = 1

# download if update flag is set:
if do_update == 1 then
  wget -O download/mdc_property_boundary.json 'https://opendata.arcgis.com/api/v3/datasets/ed0468f5e579464b84727a4ab614fd40_0/downloads/data?format=geojson&spatialRefId=4326&where=1%3D1'

# replace column names Shape__Length and Shape__Area to avoid conflict when
# providing as service on ArcServer.
sed -i 's/Shape__Length/shape_length/gI; s/Shape__Area/shape_area/gI' download/mdc_property_boundary.json

# load into postGIS with:
  ogr2ogr -lco GEOMETRY_NAME=geom -f PostgreSQL PG:"<postgres connection>" download/mdc_property_boundary.json -nlt multipolygon -nln mdc_property_boundary

#########
# Step 2 - SQL script (pseudo code):
####

# remove duplicate points and make geometries valid:
UPDATE mdc_property_boundary
  SET geom=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(geom));"

# add local geometry column and reproject existing geometries into local EPSG:
SELECT AddGeometryColumn (
  'mdc_property_boundary',
  'geom_local',2236,'multipolygon',2
);
UPDATE mdc_property_boundary
  SET geom_local=ST_MakeValid(ST_RemoveRepeatedPoints(ST_Transform(ST_Multi(geom),2236)));
CREATE INDEX mdc_property_boundary_geom_local_idx
  ON mdc_property_boundary
  USING GIST (geom_local);
NOTIFY pgrst, 'reload schema';"
